item.description:
Let's meet up at CT Pagan Pride on Saturday at 1:00 pm at the information booth. We can discuss future meetings. Hope to see many of you there.

Connecticut Pagan Pride

Time: August 28 Â· 10:00am - 5:00pm

Location: VFW - 152 Massirio Dr, Berlin, CT 06037

Connecticut Pagan Pride is a one day event that encourages the Pagan community to educate the general public about who we are and to dispel the myths that they may have.
Donations for the following are requested in lieu of admission:
Non-perishable food items for the local food bank.
Blankets, towels, pet food, and toys for the Connecticut Humane Society
In addition we are taking donations of new or gently used pagan goods (books, ritual items, electric tea lights, etc.) which will be sent to soldiers stationed overseas.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Information booth at 1:00 pm
item.name: Connecticut Pagan Pride
